### Iron Plate and Gear Storage
Consists of chests containing iron plates and iron gear wheels:
- Chest at x=56.5 y=-94.5 contains iron-gear-wheel
- Chest at x=52.5 y=-92.5 contains iron-gear-wheel
- Chest at x=53.5 y=-93.5 contains iron-plate
- Chest at x=44.5 y=-83.5 contains iron-plate
- Chest at x=61.5 y=-60.5 contains iron-plate
- Chest at x=62.5 y=-60.5 contains iron-plate
- Chest at x=62.5 y=-53.5 contains iron-plate

### Iron Ore Storage
Consists of chests containing iron ore:
- Chest at x=51.5 y=-90.5
- Chest at x=50.5 y=-90.5
- Chest at x=62.5 y=-53.5

### Miscellaneous Storage
Consists of chests containing various items:
- Chest at x=41.5 y=-84.5 contains burner-inserter and iron-ore
- Chest at x=43.5 y=-84.5 contains transport-belt and burner-inserter
- Chest at x=61.5 y=-50.5 contains transport-belt, burner-mining-drill, stone, iron-ore
- Chest at x=62.5 y=-50.5 contains wooden-chest, transport-belt, burner-inserter, wood, iron-ore

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from chests
- Ensure you are within range of the chest you are attempting to extract from. Move closer to the chest before attempting extraction.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions or important variables have been defined or invoked in the provided steps.
